metaDescription: You’ve heard about blockchains and NFTs. Maybe you’re exploring crypto and DeFi. See how people are redefining the world around you on Tezos.
heroHeading: Imagine what you can do* on Tezos
subTitle: * It's more than you think.

explainer.heading: You've probably heard about blockchains and NFTs.
body: Maybe you’re starting to explore cryptocurrency. Chances are, you'll interact with this technology without even realizing it. Right now — this very minute — artists, conservationists, entrepreneurs, collectors, game developers, comic book fans, people who want to move value across the world without roadblocks — people like you — are imagining how to build, create, and use Tezos in new and unexpected ways. Let these stories serve as a starting point as you discover how various people are re-imagining the world around us on Tezos.

sectionOne.heading: From smart money to NFTs, keep in touch with the latest advancements on Tezos.

sectionTwo.heading: People around the world are contributing to the growth of the Tezos ecosystem.
